Package fr.umlv.zen5

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.zen5.Event

  • public final class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    An event ; a pointer event or a keyboard event ; an action and its set of modifiers.

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public Event.Action getAction​()
        Returns the action of the current event.
        Returns:
        the action of the current event.

      • getModifiers

        public java.util.Set<Event.Modifier> getModifiers​()
        A set of modifier keys that can contain Event.Modifier.META, Event.Modifier.CTRL, Event.Modifier.ALT, Event.Modifier.SHIFT and/or Event.Modifier.ALT_GR.
        Returns:
        a set of modifier keys or an empty set if no modifier keys are used.

      • getLocation

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float getLocation​()
        Returns the location of the pointer on the screen.
        Returns:
        the x, y coordinates of the pointer on the screen or null if the current event is not a pointer event.

      • getKey

        public KeyboardKey getKey​()
        Returns the keyboard key.
        Returns:
        the keyboard key, KeyboardKey.UNDEFINED if the key is not recognized or null if the current event is not a keyboard event.
